oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Artist in Residence - Buddy Miller - 2010-08-17
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Second of three Artist in Residence appearances. Performance by Buddy Miller and others in the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on August 17, 2010. Special guests include Patty Griffin, Ann and Regina McCrary; Darrell Scott; Lee Ann Womack. Band includes Byron House; Brian Owens;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Buddy Miller; Patty Griffin; Darrell Scott; Lee Ann Womack; Ann McCrary; Regina McCrary;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Performances include; Don't Wait (with Ann and Regina McCrary); Heart of Hearts (with Ann and Regina McCrary); Worry Too Much (with Ann and Regina McCrary); Hank Williams' Ghost (Darrell Scott); Unidentified Song About Gravity (Darrell Scott); A Satisfied Mind (with Darrell Scott and Patty Griffin with others); Move Up (Patty Griffin); Death's Got A Warrant (Patty Griffin with others); Never Grow Old (Patty Griffin with Buddy Miller); Gasoline And Matches (with Patty Griffin); I Want To Be With You Always (with Patty Griffin); Shelter Me (with Ann and Regina McCrary); Chalk (with Patty Griffin); Mom And Dad's Waltz (with Lee Ann Womack); Does My Ring Burn Your Finger (with Lee Ann Womack); Return To Me (Lee Ann Womack); Don't Tell Me (with Lee Ann Womack); Somewhere Trouble Don't Go (with Patty Griffin, Ann and Regina McCrary); Wide River To Cross;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Miller, Buddy (Musician); Griffin, Patty, 1964-; Scott, Darrell, 1959-; McCrary, Ann; McCrary, Regina; Womack, Lee Ann; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
